title: Order appears on terminal after being placed via app
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has placed an order via MOO app
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the terminal orders
custom_expected: THEN the order will display on the terminal’s Orders list

title: User can open order on terminal via scanning barcode
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has placed an order via MOO app
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the terminal orders
AND scans the order confirmation barcode
custom_expected: THEN the order will open on the terminal

title: User can open order on terminal via tapping the order on terminal
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has placed an order via MOO app
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the terminal orders
AND taps the order on the terminal
custom_expected: THEN the order will open on the terminal

title: Order is closed on app side once the order is charged and closed on terminal
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has placed an order via MOO app
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the terminal orders
AND opens the order via scanning
custom_expected: THEN the order display as ‘picked up’ on the app side

title: Order displays as closed on terminal
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has placed an order via MOO app
custom_steps: WHEN the user scans the order in the terminal
custom_expected: THEN the order display as ‘closed’ on the terminal

title: Open Order is removed on app side once the order is canceled/voided on terminal
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has placed an order via MOO app
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the terminal orders
AND opens the order
AND the user cancels/ voids the order on the terminal
custom_expected:
THEN the order will be removed on the app 
AND the user will not be charged

title: Stored Credit Card is charged when order is placed on app
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in the Cart
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps 'place order' using ecash
custom_expected:
THEN the order will already open up as closed
AND the user will see that the order now displays as 'Last Order' or closed on the app side

title: Stored credit card is refunded when order is refunded on terminal
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has placed an order via MOO app
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the terminal orders
AND opens the order
AND the user issues a refund from the terminal for this order
custom_expected: THEN the charged amount will be refunded back to the same credit card used

title: Stored fortress account is refunded when order is cancels on app
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has placed an order via MOO app using their fortress account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the order confirmation 
AND cancels the order
custom_expected: THEN the charged amount will be refunded back to the fortress account used

title: Stored fortress account is refunded when order is canceled/voided on terminal
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has placed an order via MOO app using their fortress account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the terminal orders
AND opens the order
AND cancels/ voids the order via terminal
custom_expected: THEN the charged amount will be refunded back to the fortress account used

title: Stored Fortress account is refunded when order is refunded on terminal
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has placed an order via MOO app using their fortress account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user opens the terminal orders
AND opens the order
AND the user issues a refund from the terminal for this order
custom_expected: THEN the charged amount will be refunded back to the fortress account used
